titleStmt.title: Love's posie: or, A collection of seven and twenty love-letters, both in verse and prose; that lately pass'd betwixt a gentleman and a very young lady in France.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Joseph Hindmarsh, at the Golden Ball near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: With a final page of errata.
Imperfect: copy at reel 1972:1 lacking pp.112-115; copy at reel 2790:33 stained with slight loss of text.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Golden Ball near the Royal Exchange
